channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Microsoft blogs

item.title: Monthly news - June 2024
item.description:
Microsoft Defender for Cloud Monthly news June 2024 Edition
This is our monthly "What's new" blog post, summarizing product updates and various new assets we released over the past month. In this edition, we are looking at all the goodness from May 2024.
Legend:
Product videos
Webcasts (recordings)
Docs on Microsoft
Blogs on Microsoft
GitHub
External content
Product improvements
Announcements
Microsoft Defender for Cloud
Defender for Open-Source Relational Database plan, that now covers RDS resources in AWS, is in public preview. Specifical...
